name: Pokeheroes Pink
description: A modified version of Pokeheroes SimpleLook (https://userstyles.org/styles/108443/pokeheroes-simplelook), with a pink/blue color scheme and a flowery background.

user.name: kitestrings
user.about:
hi, i'm wren and i'm like whatever you'd call a middle-tier proficiency for something, but for CSS. more learned than a newbie but by no means an expert. i find myself wanting for some websites so i write stylish sheets for them. if i make a particularly good one, i'll share it.
that's all, thanks for reading.
